name: Barter Empire
description: Classic RPG gameplay with a massive open world! Build your empire by buying land deeds, farming and questing. Go on dates, get married and adopt children. Cooking, crafting, fishing, alchemy, bartering, hunting, farming and trade systems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Capable of Stereo Sound

reviews.review_text: For A game that cost less than a pound this is a little gem. As this was kickstarter funded you will notice that the character portraits are of people who supported the game, nice touch. The important thing is gameplay, and this game has a lot of depth. A main quest supported by lots of side quests, crafting,farming,mining,cooking there is a lot going on. The battles are the same as 3 Stars of Destiny typical RPG maker format, different tactics for different enemies are needed so a bit of thought has to be taken. I have played about 2 hours and so far there is a always something to keep me coming back. So for a cheap game give it a whirl.
